MS.S: The Carbon.Windows.Installer module is a Windows-only module that has functions for reading and installing Windows MSI_x000D__x000A_files/packages, and for replicating Windows' "Programs and Features"/"Apps and Features"_x000D__x000A_graphical user interface as objects and text._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Functions include:_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* `Get-CInstalledProgram`: reads the registry to determine all the programs installed on the local computer. Returns_x000D__x000A_an object for each program. Is an object-based and text-based version of Windows' "Programs and Features"/"Apps and_x000D__x000A_Features" GUI._x000D__x000A_* `Get-CMsi`: reads an MSI file and returns an object exposing the MSI's internal tables, like product name, product_x000D__x000A_code, product version, etc. Let's you inspect an MSI for its metadata without installing it. Can also download the MSI_x000D__x000A_file first. This function requires Windows PowerShell or PowerShell 7.1+ on Windows._x000D__x000A_* `Install-CMsi`: installs a program from an MSI file, or other file that can be installed by Windows. Can also download_x000D__x000A_the MSI file to install. This function requires Windows PowerShell or PowerShell 7.1+ on Windows._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_System Requirements:_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Windows PowerShell 5.1 on .NET 4.5.2+_x000D__x000A_* PowerShell 6.2, 7.1, or 7.2_x000D__x000A_* Windows Server 2012 R2+ or Windows 8.1+

The Carbon.Windows.Installer module is a Windows-only module that has functions for reading and installing Windows MSI_x000D__x000A_files/packages, and for replicating Windows' "Programs and Features"/"Apps and Features"_x000D__x000A_graphical user interface as objects and text._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_Functions include:_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* `Get-CInstalledProgram`: reads the registry to determine all the programs installed on the local computer. Returns_x000D__x000A_an object for each program. Is an object-based and text-based version of Windows' "Programs and Features"/"Apps and_x000D__x000A_Features" GUI._x000D__x000A_* `Get-CMsi`: reads an MSI file and returns an object exposing the MSI's internal tables, like product name, product_x000D__x000A_code, product version, etc. Let's you inspect an MSI for its metadata without installing it. Can also download the MSI_x000D__x000A_file first. This function requires Windows PowerShell or PowerShell 7.1+ on Windows._x000D__x000A_* `Install-CMsi`: installs a program from an MSI file, or other file that can be installed by Windows. Can also download_x000D__x000A_the MSI file to install. This function requires Windows PowerShell or PowerShell 7.1+ on Windows._x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_System Requirements:_x000D__x000A__x000D__x000A_* Windows PowerShell 5.1 on .NET 4.5.2+_x000D__x000A_* PowerShell 6.2, 7.1, or 7.2_x000D__x000A_* Windows Server 2012 R2+ or Windows 8.1+
